_description: A fragment of a popular song in a Latin sermon — four short lines

BLCottFausAV.Transcription:
wake wel anotþi mayden boure& get þe fra
                    Walterotfor he es lichure
BLCottFausAV.Note:
Written as prose. Folio number reflects the most recent
                    foliation.

Robbins,  Rossell Hope,

         2nd ed. Oxford: Clarendon, 1955: xxxix.
Sisam,  Celia,  and  Kenneth Sisam, eds.  
             The Oxford Book of Medieval English Verse.
         Oxford: Clarendon, 1970: 555.
